definitions: having or relating to two poles or extremities

examples.text: a sharply bipolar division of affluent and underclass

definitions: relating to or occurring in both North and South polar regions
shortDefinitions: relating to North and South Poles

definitions: (of psychiatric illness) characterized by both manic and depressive episodes, or manic ones only.
shortDefinitions: characterized by manic and depressive episodes

definitions: (of a person) suffering from bipolar disorder.
(of a nerve cell) having two axons, one either side of the cell body.
(of a transistor or other device) using both positive and negative charge carriers.
shortDefinitions: using positive and negative charge carriers
